abstract: Sam Roberts reviews books The NYPD's First Fifty Years: Politicians, Police Commissioners & Patrolmen by Bernard Whalen, Saving Place: 50 Years of New York City Landmarks, published by Museum of the City of New York for an exhibit and Hotel Mavens: Lucius M Boomer, George C Boldt and Oscar of the Waldorf by Stanley Turkel.
lead_paragraph: A look at the first 50 years of the Police Department and of New York City’s landmarks law, and a fact-filled book about the Waldorf Astoria.

headline.main: Books on the History of the Police, the Landmarks Commission and the Waldorf Astoria

snippet: A look at the first 50 years of the Police Department and of New York City’s landmarks law, and a fact-filled book about the Waldorf Astoria.
